amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part D of House Report 117-10 as en bloc No. 1: Nos. 1, 2, 3, and 4.
amendment.purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 1, 2, 3, and 4, printed in Part D of of House Report 117-10.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendments (A001) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 202 (Roll no. 73).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) without objection.
Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. Nadler.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A001) offered by Mr. Nadler.
